SUBSCRIPTIONS_PAGE.TURN_ON_AUTO_RENEWAL_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to Turn On auto-renewal?
SUBSCRIPTIONS_PAGE.TURN_OFF_AUTO_RENEWAL_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to Turn off auto-renewal?
SUBSCRIPTIONS_PAGE.CHOOSE_THE_PLAN_THAT_FITS_YOUR_TEAM: Choose the plan that fits your team

SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ1_QUESTION: Who is responsible for team payments?
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ1_ANSWER: Any user can upgrade their own team to the Professional plan by entering payment information. After upgrading, only owner can manage future payments for the team.
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ2_QUESTION: Can I use iSunFA for free?
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ2_ANSWER: Yes, the Basic Plan of iSunFA is free forever. No subscription or credit card is required to get started.
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ3_ANSWER: Credit Cards (MasterCard, Visa, JCB): Auto-renewal ensures uninterrupted subscription services.

SUBSCRIPTION_PLAN_CONTENT.YOU_CAN_CANCEL_YOUR_SUBSCRIPTION_ANYTIME: You can cancel your subscription anytime
SUBSCRIPTION_PLAN_CONTENT.NOTE: Your current plan will remain active until the next renewal date, and no refunds will be issued for the current billing period.

PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.UP_TO_24_HOURS_IN_TOTAL_4_HOURS_PER_SESS: Up to 24 hours in total, 4 hours per session
PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.UP_TO_48_HOURS_IN_TOTAL_4_HOURS_PER_SESS: Up to 48 hours in total, 4 hours per session

ERROR.TOAST_PAYMENT_FAILED_MESSAGE_PREFIX: - The last payment of your plan is failed. Please update your payment as soon as possible, or it will be downgraded to Beginner after
ERROR.TOAST_EXPIRED_REMINDER_MESSAGE_PREFIX: - Your plan is going to expired in
ERROR.TOAST_EXPIRED_REMINDER_MESSAGE_SUFFIX: days, please renew your payment to keep the service, or it will be downgraded after.
ERROR.TOAST_EXPIRED_REMINDER_MESSAGE_FOR_TODAY: - Your plan is going to expired today, please renew your payment to keep the service, or it will be downgraded after.
